QuestData.Title: The Fall of Neferset City
QuestData.Description: We are ready to strike now, $n.$B$BIf we take down Dark Pharaoh Tekahn, the immortal colossi will fall and our armies will be able to march into Neferset City.$B$BSeek him out and engage him without fear. I will make sure you're not alone when it's time to bring him down.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay the Dark Pharaoh, and Neferset falls with him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Dark Pharaoh Tekahn at Neferset City in Uldum.
QuestData.RewardText: It is done. We have defeated the Neferset inside their own city.$B$BI wish I could say that there is peace for my people at last, but I only foresee more bloodshed.
